Nothing else to say. A quite fair stay and great views of the highway behind the building. Free Internet + printing in the Business center

Reviews.Title: “Decent”
Reviews.Author: enzo4me
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on business. Hotel is very clean. There is smoking level. Up to the 5th floor has been renovated. I stayed in an older room, still very clean and in great condition. Bathrooms are very small. Would stay again for business, not for pleasure.

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs!!!”
Reviews.Author: rica77
Reviews.Content: Spent one night here after a trip. We booked for 4 adults and we had to take a room with a pull out couch because they were all out of rooms with 2 beds. The next day as we were driving home my wife and i noticed that our legs were itchy, i had about 6 big red bites, my wife had 3. I googled bed bugs when i got home and the pictures looked exactly what we had. I phoned the hotel upset and talked with the manager(Dave) , asking for my money back. He said that wouldnt be a problem and he would call me back that afternoon. Not only did i not get my money back, he's been giving me the run around for the last two weeks. I give up, ill never stay here again. Too bad ive alwayse injoyed this place until this instance.

Reviews.Title: “far from ever being a 5 star hotel---alot of near by hotels for less money & better”
Reviews.Author: harrypotter_10
Reviews.Content: you book a non-smoking room & you will find several smokers on your floor---try complaining to upper management & they will inform you that they have no control over what there guests do & you will not be compensated for a smoke filled room or hallway

Reviews.Title: “Good service just too bad the quiet floor isn't so quiet......”
Reviews.Author: Tiggersue2u
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Crowne Plaza for 2 weeks. It is very easy to find and very accessible to all areas of the city. Check in was fast and friendly. Included during our stay was a buffet breakfast daily. Food and service were very good. We had no complaints about much except for the noise from adjoining rooms whether it be beside or above. We were sitauted in what is called the "quiet" section. Let's just say it wasn't very quiet. Between hearing people opening and closing doors, going to the bathroom, running the shower, hairdryers or just talking on the phone it was nosier than most hotels I have stayed in. All of this making for inconsistent sleep. Of course there is the noise from the planes but that's too be expected being next to the airport. The beds are okay but not as comfy as the ones located at the Crowne Plaza in Hamilton. Many mornings waking with a very sore and stiff back. A great selection of restaurants all within minutes of walking distance which made it great for a change and a walk in the evening.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, unsecure parking.”
Reviews.Author: happytravellers078
Reviews.Content: The hotel on a whole was reasonable. It was clean, the rooms, particularly the bathrooms were a little on the small side and given that it was close the the airport, noisy. This is great if you are travelling to or from the airport, however if you are looking to leave your vehicle be warned. This hotel boasts 24 hr survellance and is within the boundaries of a hotel / motel watch scheme. This does not stop vehicles from being broken into. We were not the only victims and this was not a random weekend. This appears to be a regular occurrance. The hotels response to such incidents was indifferent and unculpable.

Reviews.Title: “Top airport hotel in Toronto.”
Reviews.Author: Holzwurm99
Reviews.Content: David Jiu is one of the nicest receptionists around (mentioned in another review). Recognized me as a Royal Ambassador member and upgraded me to a spotless suite incl. free breakfast buffet. Bed, pillows were comfortable, tube tv's could be replaced by flat screens though. Breakfast buffet was top notch...nothing to complain about. The location of the hotel is ideal. Free shuttle service and 4-5 chain eateries within walking distance. Will make this hotel my future choice when arriving/departing from Toronto.

Reviews.Title: “Second Class Guest”
Reviews.Author: RustyWoodstockCanada
Reviews.Content: I reserved the hotel with hotwire and then got their info from that source (regular web reference) They said a continental breakfast was included but when we arrived they informed us because we booked with hotwire we could not receive it. I feel all guests should be treated the same. It left a bad taste!

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: mamagsudbury
Reviews.Content: I must say from the moment I entered the hotel I was very impressed. A young man by the name of Dave greeted me at the desk and ensured that all was well with my family and me. He was so polite and very helpful. The beds are devine and I wish that I could have fit one in my suitcase!!!! I will return for sure and will recommend to my friends and family to stay with you.

Reviews.Title: “I didn't know this hotel was here!”
Reviews.Author: highwaydriver
Reviews.Content: I have come to know airport hotels pretty well over the years and I would say that this one has a certain charm that you wouldn't normally find. The hotel has a convinient hotel shuttle service 10 minutes away from the airport, the staff are friendly and helpful and easily give advice on what to do with your vehicle pending your return. The front desk is great and attentive, the rooms modern and smart. I don't stay at the airport often as I don't live too far away but if need to again i will certainly be back.

Reviews.Title: “A great ending”
Reviews.Author: Travel12390
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay at the Crown Plaza. The two girls at the front desk upon check out provided outstanding service. They assisted us with all our inquires and went out of their way to make us feel at home. We had a really horrible trip with our flights being cancalled and delayed, so the empathy shown to us by Lisa and Mellisa was extraordinary. We will definitely return to the Crown Plaza in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great accom..will go back”
Reviews.Author: laing1
Reviews.Content: This is the first time we have stayed here. Normally we would go to 4 Points by Sheraton but you can no longer leave your car there. Our travel agent suggested this hotel for us as he uses it for all his clients. Left car for 2 weeks no charge no problem. The room was amazing. We had room # 524 on the "quiet side". I went to get ice on the other side of the bldg and was amazed how noisy it was, with children in the halls etc and doors open and folks going back and forth due to big groups travelling together. Anyway fantastic mattress,flat screen tv,internet free,lots of thick fluffy towels, waffle weave shower curtain, freestanding glass bowl sink with granite countertop, decor amazing as newly renovated.On the bed a pouch with amenities inside: cd to help you get to sleep, eye covers, spray bottle of lavender for your pillow etc. Restaurant was excellent and not too pricey. We used this hotel b4 flying out of Pearson and will do so again in the near future. Oh also free shuttle to/from airport..

Reviews.Title: “Some good amenities”
Reviews.Author: ShutterbugTraveler
Reviews.Content: The good news is that there's a cheap shuttle to the airport, free internet and printing services to guests, nice rooms and decent food. The bad news is that for a conference, the staff was completely disorganized. The sales staff were good. The food and beverage personnel were polite but disorganized and required meticulous supervision. They have a small work out room and no pool that I'm aware of, but if you are just stopping through for a quick meeting this would be an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: “Crowne Plaza Toronto Airport just ok.”
Reviews.Author: zeczeczec
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Crowne Plaza before flying out on a trip for one night in late December 2008. The rooms are smallish, the bathroom is tiny. Toilet Paper was the really cheap, rough stuff (tp has to be pretty bad to be memorable!) Bed was nice. Upgraded desks/workstations nice. Standard crowne Plaza Sleep cd, ear plugs and night mask a nice touch. The genius who mounted the thick curtain inside the window box with an inch gap either side makes it a moot point though.. Bright morning sun is guaranteed. Ongoing lobby renovations with plastic wrapped furniture and construction heaters and blowers running. Poor price/quality of breakfast offerings Not sure what was drearier, the hotel or the staff

Reviews.Title: “So-So”
Reviews.Author: trip-trippin
Reviews.Content: We stayed here before flying out of Pearson International. The beds were very comfortable, but the bathrooms were small and I could hear planes flying by until around midnight. They were under renovations while we were there, so you want to room on one of the higher floors, away from the noise. Pool was dindgy, small and cold.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it, great hotel”
Reviews.Author: TylerDur
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with my girlfriend for a night before we went away, and we both loved it. The beds were very comfortable, probably the most comfortable bed i have slept in at a hotel. The extra touch of the sleep cd, and lavender linen spray was a nice surprise. The staff was friendly and helpful, overall staying at this hotel was a great experience. I would defintely recommend this hotel to anyone staying around the airport.
